description.narrative: This activity (Emergencies and Rapid Response Facility) is a component of Multi-year Humanitarian Programme 2013 to 2017 reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Humanitarian assistance' and a budget of £213,528,373. This component benefits Somalia, and works in the following sector(s): Emergency food assistance, Immediate post-emergency reconstruction and rehabilitation, Disaster prevention and preparedness. , with the following implementing partners: BBC Media Action, CANADEM, Crown Agents Limited, Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO), Norwegian Refugee Council, Save the Children UK, United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF), World Food Programme (WFP), World Health Organization (WHO). The start date is 01-04-2013 and the end date is 30-06-2018.

participating-org.narrative: Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO)

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
